name: The Weight of One's Crimes
description:
Part of PizzaJam 2019, a 48-hour game jam (and my first!).

The Weight of One's Crimes is a horror mystery game.

You wake up in an unknown building. You don't know who you are, or why you're here. All you can see is writing on the wall...

A team effort between daveallenbpm and me. Borrowing heavily from our favourite games in the survival horror world - Silent Hill.
